body_html: yes, it would be better to summarize all the compilation flags in one place. Looks that the most like place for sycl_nodouble would be at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources. Once sycl build is introduced here, sycl_nodouble can also be introduced here. Anyway, i think it can be done in another patch.

body: yes, it would be better to summarize all the compilation flags in one place. Looks that the most like place for sycl_nodouble would be at https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_sources. Once sycl build is introduced here, sycl_nodouble can also be introduced here. Anyway, i think it can be done in another patch.
